Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Leclaire
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Laramie, Augusta, Cicero and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Leclaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Laramie, Augusta, Cicero and Division, due to street blockage near Division/Leclaire.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th- bound Red Line Service Delayed at Chicago
ShortDescription: 95th- bound Red Line trains are standing at Chicago due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th- bound Red Line trains are standing at Chicago due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Shuttle buses are requested from Fullerton to Clark/Lake to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
